frontmatter.title: Launch OpenVPN server in Docker in 2 seconds
frontmatter.description: Have you ever had a situation when you needed to virtually place yourself into a different city, country, or continent for whatever reason? Being a software developer and, at the same time, being very passionate about Internet and cyber security, I have such a need very often, and, therefore, the ability to quickly start reliable VPN server with a decent level of security is essential.
